name: Perplexica
short_description: AI-powered search engine that delivers conversational responses with contextual understanding.
description: AI-powered search engine that delivers conversational responses with contextual understanding. Perplexica is a self-hosted application focused on ai, search, privacy, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Perplexica on your home server to ai-powered search engine that delivers conversational responses with contextual understanding without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Perplexica to manage your ai workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
